1.1.name: wordpress/stereo-3d-player
1.1.description:
This software is designed for a better visual effect of stereoscopic pictures in wordpress-powered blogs. Thanks to HTML5 canvas element and CSS3, the posts with this plugin could be very impressive for the stereoscopic 3D pictures. No extra complicated programming language is needed at all.

Features:

  1. Astonishing visual effect;

  2. Play your own 3D pictures;

  3. Auto-resizable player window and stereoscopic images;

Note: links (javascript and css files) to the domain of http://www.stereo3dweb.com are included in this edition.
